## Paris Airbnb EDA

First we need to download the data.
We do this from http://insideairbnb.com/, "Data," "Get the Data," and scrolling down to Paris.
I use the  "listings.csv" data set saved as a link for a table of the complete Airbnb listings information.

```{r}
airbnb_data <-
  read_csv("http://data.insideairbnb.com/france/ile-de-france/paris/2023-12-12/visualisations/listings.csv")

write_csv(airbnb_data, "airbnb_paris_data.csv")

```
